attributes.action: Reinforce the right of Habeas Corpus within the Terrorism Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As far as my understanding of the act reaches, it is not currently neccessary for prosecutors to release the evidence against an individual accused of terroist activities, to the accused.

This is seen as a breach of Habeas Corpus, because the defendant cannot have a full knowledge of the lawfullness of his detention, unless he is aware of the evidence against him.
